title: Review on Pak vs NZ odi 2023
caption: Image
content:
Preparation before the Icc world cup 2023



Dono team Pakistan aur NewZealand world cup se phale apne team banne ke kosish karenge 3-odi series mai, Jaha eek taraf

NewZealand

odi team ranking mai top per hai aur from 2021 eek single match nahi hari hai, lekin is mai se eek win bhi NewZealand ko Asia mai nahi mile hai, the last time they visited to Asia subcontinent was in 2018, where they drew 50-over series 1-1 against Pakistan in UAE, and this will be their first ODI series in Pakistan since December 2023


Pakistan

Akri match khela tha August mai against Netherland jaha Babar ka team ne Netherland ko 3-0 se harakar ayee thee, Pakistan ka bhi apne ghar per Odi mai achaa record hai lekin last series England se harne ke baad, Nai managment ka ye phela Intahaam hai let see what they can do to Uplift Pak in odi


Kya expect kare kal ka match se Draw tho hone se raha ... Jaha National Stadium Karachi mai hum bade target lagte dekh sakte aisa kyo bol raha ho last time Pak vs SL ke bich har match mai Score 280+ raha tha so we can expect this time to ..

Team for 1st odi

NewZealand

Finn Allen, Devon Conway, Kane Williamson(c), Tom Latham, Daryl Mitchell/ Glenn Phillips, Matchell Santner, Tim Southee,Ish Sodhi,Mitchael Bracewell, Jocob Duffy,Lockie Ferguson

ye hai mere taraf se NewZealand ki team aab jara

Pakistan

ki team dekh lete hai Imam-ul-haq, Shan Masood, Babar Azam(c), Md. Rizwan,Agha Salman, Md. nawaz, Haris Sohail, Md.wasim Jr, Haris Rauf,Naseem Shah, Dahani


mere ko lagta hai Pakistan ye match jeet sakta hai let's see kal he pata chale gaa
author: Satyam kumar
metadesc: Preparation before the Icc world cup 2023, dono team Pakistan aur NewZealand world cup se phale apne team banne ke kosish karenge....
